```{r setup}
library(cpp)
X = mydataset %>% select(-Dep.var)
Y = mydataset %>% select(Dep.var)

set.seed(1)
beta0 = rnorm(3)

tolerance=1e-3  # tolerance
maxit=1000      # max iteration, not to run forever
stepsize=1e-8 

tic()
GD_R = betahat_GD_R(beta0, X, Y, tolerance, maxit, stepsize)
toc()
GD_R

```
